title: NBA trade buzz: Live updates and intel on deadline day
content: Catch up on what we're hearing before the 3 p.m. ET trade deadline, with updates on Giannis Antetokounmpo, Ivica Zubac and more.

title: Sources: Bucks to keep Giannis through deadline
content: The Milwaukee Bucks have indicated to teams that they are keeping Giannis Antetokounmpo through the trade deadline and have started making other trades.

title: Ex-Patriots call 'bull crap' on Brady's SB stance
content: Tom Brady said he doesn't have a "dog in the fight" in this year's Super Bowl, and his former New England Patriots teammates are calling "bull crap."

title: 'We're poor': Sampson bemoans UH's low budget
content: Houston coach Kelvin Sampson said his top-10 team can't sign more recruits because the school's athletic department is "very poor."

title: Sources: Dosunmu to Wolves in latest Bulls trade
content: The Timberwolves have acquired guard Ayo Dosunmu in a four-player trade with the Bulls, sources told ESPN.

title: Sources: Knicks acquiring PG Alvarado from Pels
content: The Knicks are acquiring guard Jose Alvarado from the Pelicans in exchange for Dalen Terry, two second-round picks and cash, sources told ESPN.

title: Lakers acquire Kennard from Hawks, sources say
content: The Lakers have acquired guard Luke Kennard from the Hawks in exchange for guard Gabe Vincent and a 2032 second-round pick, sources told ESPN's Shams Charania on Thursday.

title: McMorris to miss big air event after hard crash
content: Canadian snowboarder Mark McMorris has withdrawn from the big air qualifier at the Milan Cortina Olympics less than 24 hours after a hard crash that resulted in a brief trip to the hospital.

title: BYU coach hurt by another anti-Mormon chant
content: BYU coach Kevin Young shared his disappointment over the anti-Mormon chants that could be heard from the Oklahoma State student section during the No. 16 Cougars' upset loss to the Cowboys.

title: ⚾ Olney and Passan's MLB offseason lessons
content: From more outrage over MLB's top spenders to what to make of deals that never happened, here's what we learned this winter.

title: Barnwell’s annual Super Bowl opus: We size up every facet of Seahawks-Patriots and pick the winner
content: Can Drake Maye hit enough big plays? Which Sam Darnold will show up? And will defense define this Super Bowl matchup? Let's go deep on Seahawks-Patriots.

title: Team USA's Laila Edwards ready to make Olympic hockey history
content: Laila Edwards, a standout at Wisconsin, is ready for her Olympic debut as USA Hockey's first Black player.

title: The Faces of the Games: 32 U.S. Olympians to watch
content: On Friday, the 2026 Milan Cortina Olympics will kick off. From Lindsey Vonn to Amber Glenn, here are the athletes you'll want to know.

title: Wetzel: Standing on the brink of anything-goes NCAA eligibility
content: By not controlling who is eligible, the NCAA is losing the ability to function as an organizing athletic body.

title: AD is a Wizard?! Grading the shocking trade -- and why one team came out on top
content: Anthony Davis joins Washington in an eight-player trade. Kevin Pelton breaks down what's next for the Wizards and the Mavericks.

title: Why did the Wizards and Jazz trade for All-Stars now? They're already thinking about 2027
content: Anthony Davis to ... Washington? Jaren Jackson Jr. to Utah?! What are these two lottery teams planning?

title: Power Rankings: Can Texas exact revenge and snap LSU's win streak?
content: The Tigers seek to sweep a key series in the SEC, but the Longhorns look to avenge their loss in Baton Rouge from last month.

title: NHL Awards Watch: Kucherov gaining on MacKinnon for MVP?
content: We polled PHWA voters to find out who's ahead in the major races as some new names have entered the conversation for the Hart and Vezina.

title: Super Bowl LX: Seahawks-Patriots marks latest rematch in big game
content: This year marks the 10th different repeat Super Bowl matchup and the fourth the New England Patriots are involved in themselves.

title: An epic halftime and Manning's farewell: Revisiting Levi's Stadium's last Super Bowl
content: Cam Newton vs. Peyton Manning was among the notable items from the last time the Bay Area hosted the big game.

title: High school stories of 11 Super Bowl stars -- and two coaches
content: Find out what Sam Darnold, Drake Maye, Cooper Kupp, TreVeyon Henderson and others were like before the NFL.

title: Sixty bets for Super Bowl 60
content: We navigated the thousands of bets being offered for Super Bowl LX and narrowed it down to our 60 favorite from 10 different categories.

title: Wrexham have Premier League in sight, just five years after Reynolds and Mac takeover
content: Feb. 9 marks five years since Ryan Reynolds and Rob Mac completed their Wrexham takeover and already, they're on track for promotion to the Premier League.

title: Road to $1M paydays: How WNBA salaries evolved with each CBA
content: For the first time, a $1 million base salary is expected in the new WNBA CBA, and the cap could see a 230% increase.

title: Who you calling old? At the 2026 Olympics, age is just a number
content: Lindsey Vonn, Nick Goepper, Gus Kenworthy and Maddy Schaffrick are in their golden years at the 2026 Olympics. Just don't call them old.

title: NBA Power Rankings: Where all 30 teams stack up ahead of trade deadline
content: Which players are under the most pressure and where all 30 teams rank a day before the Thursday trade deadline.

title: 12 teams that improved their 2026 CFP chances with their roster moves
content: With signing day closing many team's personnel moves, we look at the teams ready to make long postseason runs.

title: From AD and Harden to JJJ and Vucevic: Fantasy reaction to the latest NBA trades
content: Andre Snellings and Eric Moody provide fantasy reactions as trades go down leading up to Thursday's NBA trade deadline.

title: Men's boxing pound-for-pound rankings: Stevenson moves up, shakes up the top 10
content: Shakur Stevenson's victory over Teofimo Lopez Jr. vaulted him up the list, but just how high did he climb? Here are the latest ESPN pound-for-pound rankings.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Sterling in Napoli talks after ending Chelsea contract
content: Raheem Sterling is in talks to join Napoli, while Barcelona and Real Madrid eye Tottenham's Cristian Romero. Transfer Talk has the latest.

title: 70% Of Air India Planes Have Recurring Technical Issues: Centre
content: More than seven out of every ten aircraft reviewed in the Air India Group fleet have shown recurring technical defects, according to official data tabled in Parliament on Thursday.

title: "What Do We Do With Shaadi.com?" Irked Top Court In Matrimonial Dispute Case
content: The Supreme Court while hearing a case involving matrimonial discord today, expressed concern about the online platform Shaadi.com.

title: 'Will Teach You MNS Style': Leader's Threat To Bank Official Over Marathi
content: The language issue reared its head again on Thursday after a Maharashtra Navnirman Sena leader confronted a bank official in Mumbai for refusing to speak in Marathi and threatened to teach him a lesson in "MNS style"

title: Poll Panel Tells Top Court Bengal Government 'Wilfully Neglected' Directions
content: The Election Commission has told the Supreme Court that the enumeration phase of the special intensive revision of electoral rolls in West Bengal saw several incidents of violence, intimidation and obstruction against election officials.

title: 'Working On Reusable Launch Vehicle Technology': ISRO Chief V Narayanan
content: Indian Space Research Organisation (ISRO) chairman Dr V Narayanan on Thursday said the space agency is currently working on the development of reusable launch vehicle (RLV) technology, underlining India's focus on cost-effective access to space.

title: Trump Announces May Prayer Rally In Washington
content: US President Donald Trump on Thursday announced he is organizing a prayer rally on the National Mall in Washington in a bid to "rededicate" Americans' devotion to God.

title: 1,000 Buildings Face Heating Delays As Kyiv Scrambles To Fix Power Plant
content: A Ukrainian power plant that was damaged in Russian strikes and that supplied heating to more than 1,100 apartment buildings in Kyiv may need two months to repair, mayor Vitali Klitschko said Thursday.

title: US Ambassador Accuses Poland Parliament Speaker Of Insulting Trump
content: The United States embassy will have "no further dealings" with the speaker of the Polish parliament after claims he insulted President Donald Trump, its ambassador said on Thursday.

title: Class 12 Student Cuts Off Teacher's Lips In Roadside Attack In UP
content: A Class 12 student in Mainpuri, Uttar Pradesh, allegedly attacked his teacher with a sharp weapon on January 26, severing both her lips, according to police.

title: What Ujjain Teen's Kidnapping, Recovery Reveal And Why It Stirred Concern
content: A case that began with a missing teenager in Ujjain has now exploded allegedly into a disturbing investigation stretching across cities.

title: Political Storm Over Madhya Pradesh Minister's Threat On "Ladli Behna" Scheme
content: A fresh political firestorm has erupted in Madhya Pradesh after Karan Singh Verma, the state's Revenue Minister and MLA from Ichhawar, allegedly issued an indirect threat to women beneficiaries of the Ladli Behna Yojana at a public event.

title: 'Energy Security Top Priority': India After Trump's Russian Oil Claim
content: Amid US President Donald Trump's claim that India has agreed to halt purchases of Russian oil, the Ministry of External Affairs on Thursday reiterated that ensuring energy security for its 1.4 billion people remains the top priority for centre.

title: 'Ties With India Witnessed Setback During Yunus Regime': Bangladesh Official
content: Bangladesh's Foreign Affairs Adviser Touhid Hossain Thursday admitted that ties with India witnessed a "setback" during the interim regime led by Muhammad Yunus, but hoped that the relations could be restored under an elected government.

title: "Colourful": Jamaat Chief's Response To Question On India-Bangladesh Ties
content: In its manifesto for the upcoming elections, the Bangladesh Jamaat-E-Islami called for peaceful and cooperative relations with neighbouring countries, including India, Bhutan, Nepal, Myanmar, Sri Lanka, the Maldives and Thailand.

title: All About Bangladesh's Student-Led Party That Toppled Sheikh Hasina
content: Bangladesh is heading into its first election after a student-led uprising forced former Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina to resign and flee the country a year-and-a-half ago.

title: Killed Husband For Waiter: New Details In Rajasthan Honeymoon Murder
content: Shock and gloom have shrouded two families, who knew each other well and had seen three marriages between their members, after a woman killed her husband with the help of her lover and his friends in Sri Ganganagar district.

title: BJPs Advice To Bengal Cadre On Countering Mamata Banerjee's Delhi Play
content: Mamata Banerjee has wrapped up an eventful Delhi visit that featured a cameo in Supreme Court in the case over Special Intensive Revision (SIR), a fiery meeting with the Election Commission.

title: Assaulted During Theft, Thief Approaches Bengaluru Police
content: An alleged thief in Bengaluru has filed a police complaint against his victims, claiming he was assaulted while attempting a robbery.

title: 'Would Like To Joke About It': Kremlin Rejects Epstein Russian Spy Claims
content: The Kremlin said on Thursday it did not want to waste time answering questions about unproven suggestions in Western media and by Poland's premier that late sex offender Jeffrey Epstein may have been some sort of Russian intelligence asset.

title: Russia, US Agree To Resume Military Contacts At Ukraine Talks
content: Russia and the United States have agreed to resume high-level military contacts at two-day Ukraine talks in Abu Dhabi on Thursday, in a major step of rapprochement between the world's top nuclear powers.

title: Re-ranking the Premier League: Who's up? Who's down?
content: Oliver Glasner was named manager of the month for september . he will be followed up by Enzo Maresca, whose Chelsea won three and drew one in November . Glasner has publicly stated that he'll be leaving his club . click here for all the latest transfer news .

title: Tamil Nadu elections: How BJP plans to do a Bihar in state and will it be enough?
content: The BJP is attempting to replicate its Bihar electoral strategy in Tamil Nadu by consolidating opposition forces and forming a broad social alliance across major caste segments. Aiming to counter the DMK, the party is forging alliances with former partners and breakaway factions, including the AIADMK and PMK, to build a wider NDA for the upcoming assembly elections.

title: 'They stole surname of Gujarati': PM mocks Gandhis, takes failed 'start-up' jab at Rahul
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi sharply criticised the Congress and the Gandhi family in the Rajya Sabha, accusing them of being "habitual thieves" and alleging they stole Mahatma Gandhi's surname. He also targeted Rahul Gandhi, calling him "Yuvraj" and criticizing his "traitor" remark against a Sikh MP, which he deemed an insult to Sikhs and the community's sacrifices.

title: Meta's most-popular former employee to OpenAI VP: There is no way your company is achieving its goal
content: Meta's ex-AI chief Yann LeCun has publicly challenged OpenAI's claims of nearing Artificial General Intelligence (AGI).  He criticized their research secrecy, arguing that true progress requires open sharing. LeCun also dismissed the notion that AGI will emerge from a single company or breakthrough, asserting OpenAI doesn't hold a monopoly on innovation.

title: T20 WC: SLC writes to PCB after Pakistan’s stand of boycotting India fixture in Colombo
content: Sri Lanka Cricket has written to the Pakistan Cricket Board urging it to reconsider Pakistan’s decision to boycott the T20 World Cup match against India in Colombo, warning of major financial losses and damage to tourism. Invoking Sri Lanka’s tours of Pakistan despite grave security threats, including the 2009 convoy attack, SLC appealed for reciprocity in the broader interests of the game.

title: Dell sued by 5 ex-employees; complaint alleges that the company mismanaged its 401(k) plan
content: Five ex-Dell employees are suing the tech giant, alleging its 401(k) plan mismanagement cost workers over $318 million. The lawsuit claims Dell violated federal law by keeping workers in underperforming investment funds while profiting from its own products.  This class action seeks to recover losses and reform the retirement plan's operations.

title: Ghaziabad sisters' suicide: 'Death better than beatings', daughters wrote in diary
content: Three sisters, aged 16, 14, and 12, died after falling from the ninth floor of their Ghaziabad apartment building. A neighbor witnessed the eldest sister on the window ledge with the younger two holding her, before they all fell. Police are investigating, with a diary and mobile phone recovered from the puja room.

title: No more misleading ads: SC makes self-declaration mandatory before every ad
content: The Supreme Court highlighted that the misleading advertisements are not a minor regulatory issue but a direct consumer rights concern inherently connected with the health of people and trust in society

title: OpenAI sees exit of senior-level employees after CEO makes it compulsory to use ChatGPT
content: OpenAI is experiencing a significant exodus of senior researchers as CEO Sam Altman prioritizes ChatGPT development over long-term AI exploration.  Key figures, including a VP of research, have departed due to resource allocation disputes, with experimental projects reportedly sidelined.  This strategic shift, driven by intense competition, leaves some teams feeling marginalized and questioning their original research goals.

title: Hammam mein sab...: Why Trump is untouched by Epstein files
content: Trump appears in the Epstein files in a strangely spectral way. His name is everywhere, but his voice is nowhere. He shows up in third-party emails, in interview notes, in calendars, in contact lists, and in messages where other people discuss him as a destination, a favour, or a point of access.

title: England Test captain Ben Stokes left bloodied after brutal facial injury
content: England Test captain Ben Stokes sustained a nasty facial injury during a training session, sharing a graphic image of his bruised eye and bandaged nose. Despite the blow, Stokes humorously commented on the cricket ball's condition. This incident follows a challenging Ashes campaign for England, with Stokes set to return for the Test series against New Zealand in June.

title: Ayesha Curry speaks on resilience as Stephen Curry backs her amid trolling
content: Stephen Curry and his wife, Ayesha Curry, have been together ever since the two were young adults. Close to two decades of being together, Ayesha Curry has opened up about the life she has built for herself, away from her husband's fame and wealth. While Ayesha Curry has also faced a lot of hurdles in her life, Stephen Curry has stayed by her side.

title: Nick Emmanwori injury update: Seahawks safety tweaks ankle before Super Bowl
content: Seattle Seahawks rookie safety Nick Emmanwori suffered an ankle injury during Wednesday’s crucial practice, raising hefty concerns just days before the Big Game. The team awaits imaging results to assess the severity of the injury. Emmanwori, a key player with more than just impressive rookie season, could see Ty Okada and Riq Woolen step up their game if he’s sidelined. Two other South Carolina stars, apart from the rookie, will play in Super Bowl.

title: Klay Thompson’s girlfriend Megan Thee Stallion lands NBC comedy role
content: Grammy winner Megan Thee Stallion is set to guest star on NBC's "The Fall and Rise of Reggie Dinkins" as Denise, a love interest for Daniel Radcliffe's character.  The sitcom, also starring Tracy Morgan, follows a former NFL star's comeback. This role marks another step in Megan's expanding acting career, building on previous screen appearances.

title: Rajpal Yadav surrenders at Tihar jail, Rahman reacts to communal comment: Top 5 entertainment news
content: Abhishek Bachchan celebrated his 50th with heartfelt wishes from Aishwarya Rai Bachchan. AR Rahman hinted at moving past the 'Chhava' controversy, suggesting explanations are often ignored. Rajpal Yadav surrendered to Tihar jail in a cheque bounce case.

title: Violence erupts in Manipur: Mob clashes with security forces
content: Protests erupted in Manipur's Churachandpur district following MLA Nemcha Kipgen's appointment as deputy chief minister, leading to clashes. Demonstrators set fire to discarded materials and hurled stones at security forces who responded with a baton charge. Two individuals sustained minor injuries, and additional forces have been deployed to manage the tense situation.

title: Rajpal Yadav surrenders at Tihar Jail after Delhi High Court denies relief in cheque-bounce cases
content: Bollywood actor Rajpal Naurang Yadav on Thursday surrendered before the Tihar Jail authorities after the Delhi High Court refused to extend the deadline granted to him in connection with his conviction in multiple cheque dishonour cases.

title: Gujarat man arrested in US for human trafficking, sexual crimes
content: A 42-year-old Gujarat man, Vikas Patel, was arrested in Kentucky, USA, on charges including human trafficking, sexual abuse, rape, and theft by deception. Allegations from two women detail withheld wages and sexual assault, including commercial sexual activity with a minor. The investigation began after a complaint regarding employment and housing arrangements.

title: Record high, crash, rally, crash! Why are gold, silver prices down again? Explained
content: Gold, silver price crash: It’s a story of a stunning rally, a record breaking crash, a breather rally, and a crash all over again. Gold and silver have been in focus since 2025 for their unprecedented rally, and a rise that beat all expectations.

title: Beyond the tricolour: Indian-origin captains at the T20 World Cup 2026
content: As India co-hosts the T20 World Cup 2026, several associate nations will feature captains of Indian origin, adding a unique narrative. Players like Monank Patel (USA), Dilpreet Bajwa (Canada), and Jatinder Singh (Oman) lead their teams, showcasing the global reach of cricket and their ambition to challenge established powers on the world stage.

title: PM Modi’s Malaysia visit to strengthen strategic partnership — what to watch for
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi will visit Malaysia on February 7-8 to strengthen ties and expand cooperation under a Comprehensive Strategic Partnership. He will hold bilateral talks with PM Anwar Ibrahim, review key sectors like trade and defense, and address the Indian community. The visit aims to deepen engagement with the ASEAN region and boost business ties.

title: Mumbai woman regains independence after giant incisional hernia surgery
content: Surgeons at Medicover Hospital successfully treated a 75-year-old woman's giant recurrent incisional hernia, measuring 18 cm. The complex four-hour surgery involved abdominal wall reconstruction, including Botox injections and a component separation technique with a large mesh. The patient experienced significant relief and a swift recovery, walking the day after surgery and being discharged within five days.

title: Five years, 10 states: Where India’s government school count fell the most
content: Lok Sabha data shows that India’s government school count has declined over the past five years, but the fall is neither even nor gradual. It is concentrated in a handful of states and often arrives in sharp, single-year corrections. The numbers point to administrative change more than a uniform national trend, raising questions about how the official school map is being reshaped locally.

title: 16 dead in Meghalaya 'illegal' coal mine blast; several feared trapped
content: Tragedy struck Meghalaya's East Jaintia Hills as an explosion at a suspected illegal coal mine claimed at least 16 lives on Thursday. Several others remain trapped as rescue operations are underway. Officials confirmed the blast occurred in the Thangsku area, with one injured labourer hospitalized. The incident highlights the dangers of unscientific mining practices.

title: 'I eat 2kg of gaalis daily': In light moment during RS speech, PM Modi reveals 'health secret'
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi delivered a strong speech in Rajya Sabha criticising the Congress for decades of misgovernance and alleged deep hatred towards him. Modi also targeted Rahul Gandhi's recent comments, calling them an insult to Sikhs. The Prime Minister stated that much of the NDA's work involves correcting past mistakes.

title: ‘Conflict nearing end’: Centre, Nagaland and ENPO sign FNTA agreement — what it means
content: The Central government, Nagaland government, and ENPO have signed an agreement to establish the Frontier Nagaland Territorial Authority (FNTA) to address the demands of Eastern Nagaland. Union Home Minister Amit Shah stated the MHA will fund the new body and ensure development in the region, marking progress towards peace and development in the Northeast.

title: What exactly is a laminate? 6 things to know about it
content: Laminates are more than just a surface finish. They are engineered material systems that define how interiors perform and last. Modern laminates offer advanced durability, hygiene, and safety features. They adapt to changing design trends and lifestyles. This makes them a practical and reliable choice for homes and commercial spaces. Laminates are also increasingly made with sustainability in mind.

title: Cristiano Ronaldo turns 41: Career goals, records, achievements and net worth
content: Cristiano Ronaldo, a global football icon, continues to defy age with his unparalleled goalscoring prowess and relentless ambition.  Now 41, he boasts 961 career goals and a trophy-laden career, with the FIFA World Cup still a dream.  Beyond the pitch, his commercial empire solidifies his status as a sporting billionaire, proving his hunger for greatness remains undimmed.

title: 'Asked PM not to come to House': LS Speaker says plot by Cong MPs to create 'inappropriate incident'
content: Lok Sabha was adjourned amid security concerns over alleged Congress plans to attack Prime Minister Narendra Modi, despite his presence. Opposition rejected the claims, accusing the government of stalling proceedings. The Prime Minister is expected to address the Rajya Sabha later.

title: After IPL exclusion, Lahore Qalandars sign Bangladesh pacer Mustafizur Rahman for PSL
content: Lahore Qalandars have secured Bangladesh fast bowler Mustafizur Rahman for the 2026 Pakistan Super League season. Rahman, a former Qalandar, returns to the franchise after a stint with Kolkata Knight Riders in the IPL. His signing comes after recent developments involving the IPL and Bangladesh cricket.

title: Govinda’s manager denies bankruptcy rumours, says debts are cleared
content: Govinda's manager Shashi Sinha has strongly refuted claims of the actor's financial distress and marital problems. Sinha clarified that Govinda remains in demand for films and events, receiving numerous offers from top industry figures. A significant project is expected to be announced soon.

title: T20 World Cup: 'Humari flight book hai Colombo ki' - India captain Surya on Pakistan clash
content: India captain Suryakumar Yadav confirmed the team will head to Colombo for their T20 World Cup match against Pakistan, despite uncertainty.  Pakistan's Salman Ali Agha stated their participation hinges on government directives, with the Pakistani government having previously announced a boycott of the February 15th fixture.

title: 'Bizarre thing...': Shashi Tharoor reacts to son Ishan being sacked by Washington Post
content: Reacting on X, Tharoor wrote: “The bizarre thing about this so-called ‘business decision’ by The Washington Post is that @ishaantharoor’s column flourished on the Internet,” adding that Ishaan Tharoor had “500,000 (half a million plus!) individual subscribers” for his WorldView newsletter. He said he had met foreign ministers, diplomats and scholars around the world who read the newsletter daily, and argued that the newspaper could have tried monetising that reach instead of abolishing it.

title: BCCI | SC grants relief to Anurag Thakur, free to return to cricket administration
content: The Supreme Court has granted relief to former BCCI chief Anurag Thakur, potentially paving his return to cricket administration. The court modified a 2017 order that barred him from BCCI affairs, acknowledging the ban's lengthy duration. This decision follows Thakur's plea for modification, aiming to lift the nine-year restriction.

title: Valentine's week: Best to worst beauty habits for your romantic dates
content: Valentine's Week 2026 celebrations can impact your skin significantly. Skin expert ranks common romantic activities, highlighting that cosy nights in and nourishing meals benefit your complexion. Conversely, late-night parties, excessive alcohol and sugary treats lead to dryness, breakouts and dullness. Prioritising sleep and proper skincare is crucial for maintaining healthy skin amidst the festivities.

title: 'Was fired because my manager was insecure': Employee shares how toxic leadership damages companies
content: A talented content professional was abruptly fired after his manager perceived his viral comedy reel, satirizing corporate life, as a threat. Despite a recent salary hike and strong performance, Ajay Sharma Chinta was forced to resign, highlighting how insecurity and office politics can stifle creativity and lead to talent loss within companies.

title: Ghostbusters: Back Sam Darnold, Seahawks to exorcise some demons in Super Bowl LX
content: the Seattle Seahawks cruised to a 13-3 record in a 35-point victory over the Denver Broncos . the incantation proved effective, as the organization's second Super Bowl appearance and lone win . 'why not us?" mantra was invoked ahead of the 2013 season .

title: NHL trade grades: Who comes out ahead in Artemi Panarin trade?
content: the 2025-26 NHL trade season is off to a busy start . the Vancouver Canucks traded defenseman Rasmus Andersson to the Vegas Golden Knights . earlier, the Pittsburgh Penguins sent goaltender Tristan Jarry and forward Sam Poulin to the Edmonton Oilers .

title: Who makes Mike Macdonald's defense so good? Seahawks to watch in Super Bowl LX
content: the seahawks are on a more impressive Super Bowl run than the Patriots . the Seahawks have held opponents to 10 points or fewer five times . it's the biggest reason the Seattles won a club-record 14 games during the regular season .

title: Grading every NBA trade: Which teams have fared best?
content: the NBA trade deadline is closing in at 3 p.m. ET on friday . the first featured the Atlanta Hawks sending star point guard Trae Young to the Washington Wizards . three weeks later, the Cleveland Cavaliers , Sacramento Kings and Chicago Bulls completed a swap .

title: Power Rankings: A static top 5 (for now), but big rises (Kansas) and drops (Gonzaga, BYU) elsewhere
content: the top of the men's college basketball Power Rankings has remained pretty stagnant for weeks now . even Illinois, the newest member of the top five, is riding a 12-game winning streak and hasn't lost since Dec. 13 . before the next edition of the rankings, four of our top-five teams have road games against other top-25 teams .

title: Ranking the top 10 prospects in all 30 MLB farm systems
content: the top 10 prospects for all 30 major league farm systems are listed below . players in the big leagues are eligible for this update as MLB rookie eligibility rules apply here . there are 130 at-bats, 50 innings pitched or 45 days on the active roster .

title: Cabinet clears AI-powered software to identify hate speech, misinformation and malicious campaigns
content: Patil says there will be no human interference in this, and that no party or government will benefit

title: Supreme Court upholds Telangana High Court decision that free allotment of land to IAMC is ‘unsustainable’
content: The top court dismisses petition filed by International Arbitration & Mediation Centre and agreed with the High Court that gratuitous distribution of natural resources was both “unsustainable and contrary to the procedure”

title: UPSC expands conditions for attempting CSEs after being allotted for IPS, Group A Services
content: Face authentication of candidates at exam venues, live photo capture during form filling made mandatory; many point out notification riddled with spelling mistakes

title: Government says 2,645 posts vacant at AAI, 3 aviation regulators
content: In a separate written reply, Mr. Mohol said that a total of 6,936 flights were cancelled by IndiGo during the last three months affecting 10,81,680 passengers

title: Sri Lankan diplomat lauds Indian government, people for relief efforts following Cyclone Ditwah
content: He also refers to the Sri Lankan government’s commitment to relief, rehabilitation, and climate-resilient development after the cyclone

title: Rajya Sabha adopts Motion to Thank President, Opposition raises questions on U.S. trade deal
content: Shiv Sena (UBT) MP Priyanka Chaturvedi says even EAM had been unaware of the details of the trade deal; BJP MP Maya Naroliya says under the Modi government, the allocation to agriculture sector increased

title: Congress takes out march to condemn Union government for diluting MGNREGA
content: While speaking at a meeting, TNCC president K. Selvaperunthagai says leaders, including Leader of the Opposition in the Lok Sabha Rahul Gandhi and Congress president Mallikarjun Kharge, have expressed concerns about the dilution of MGNREGA, both inside and outside Parliament

title: Congress flags ‘procedural irregularities’ in Motion of Thanks debate
content: Rules of Procedure make it mandatory for PM to explain government’s position at the end of the debate or inform the House of his inability to do so, says Congress; seeks Speaker’s explanation

title: NHRC issues notice over allegations of exploitation, forced religious conversion of women at gyms
content: The Commission directs Chief Secretaries of States, Union Territories to form guidelines/policy/registration norms and standards for such establishments

title: No takers for ₹57-lakh truss work at Mundamveli apartments
content: The truss installation was cleared after a three-member panel, including an expert from IIT Madras, conducted a structural stability analysis in August 2025

title: SRM University-A.P. invites applications for M.Tech courses, deadline February 15
content: Candidates can submit their applications forms by visiting  the official werbsite  https://applications.srmap.edu.in/m-tech

title: Kuki-Zo groups boycott tribal MLAs in Manipur government, accuse them of ‘betrayal’
content: The Kuki-Zo Council said that by joining a Meitei-dominated government, the Kuki-Zo MLAs have disregarded the pain and sacrifices endured by the community during the ethnic conflict

title: Court cannot examine correctness of route for metro line, says Karnataka HC
content: However, court asks authorities to examine concern of property owners and business establishments of Nagarbhavi

title: Experts prepare to tranquilise tiger after second cattle kill
content: Pune-based RESQ experts joined the monitoring exercise and Hyderabad-based HyTICOs experts will join the operation on Friday; The tiger moved along the borders of Konaseema, Kakinada by Thursday night

title: V.S. Achuthanandan’ s son says CPI(M) will decide whether or not to accept Padma Vibhushan
content: The party V.S. Achuthanandan represented has a clear stance on accepting official honours. As a communist, he held such values and the party’s decisions closely. So the family’s decision on accepting the honour will be in tandem with the CPI(M)’s position on the matter, says Arun Kumar

title: High Court quashes order on Group-1 revaluation; brings relief to 563 appointees
content: The Division Bench rejected the single bench order and allowed the appeals filed by the selected candidates for their continuation in the long-pending recruitment process for 563 Group-1 posts in the State.

title: Efficient water management will ensure a drought-free State: Naidu
content: Water Users' Associations play a key role in water governance, works will be allotted to irrigation associations without GST, while allowing them to collect water tax and manage canals efficiently, says Chief Minister Chandrababu Naidu

title: Meghalaya coal mine explosion LIVE: At least 18 people dead; several feared trapped
content: The East Jaintia Hills district police confirmed the recovery of 18 bodies and said the people died after an explosion inside the mine that trapped them

title: Ghaziabad deaths renew focus on gaming addiction among children in Karnataka
content: Doctors at NIMHANS say they are witnessing a steady rise in children seeking help for problematic technology and gaming use

title: Govt is determined it won’t allow LoP to speak in both Houses, says Congress chief
content: Kharge says Opposition was forced to walk out of the Rajya Sabha because the government was not ready to listen; Congress leaders slam PM’s speech as partisan and misleading

title: Laddu row: one-man panel a diversionary tactic by TDP, says YSRCP
content: Party leaders deny allegations that the Central Food Technological Research Institute report was suppressed during the YSRCP government’s tenure

title: ‘Udhayam’ agri-entrepreneurship meet draws huge crowd
content: A wide range of spices, agricultural produce, and processed foods were showcased, with the participation of around 100 micro and small entrepreneurs from Kozhikode and neighbouring areas

title: Webinar on biotechnology education to be held on February 8
content: The session will bring together experts from academia, international education, and research to discuss how biotechnology education is evolving to meet the demands of a sustainable and innovation-led future

title: Vigilance arrests former priest over ‘irregularities’ in sale of ghee at Sabarimala
content: Vigilance investigation finds that Sunilkumar Potti, 13th accused, misappropriated and converted the sale proceeds of 62 packets of ghee worth ₹68,200, for his use for 17 days

title: Treasury and Opposition benches trade barbs in Rajya Sabha
content: Opposition flags events in LS, accuses government of preventing LoP Rahul Gandhi from speaking; Chair says LS proceedings cannot be discussed in RS, stops Mr. Kharge from reading Navarane memoir excerpts

title: Army renames 246 roads, buildings, and facilities to shed colonial legacy
content: The Indian Army stated that the revised nomenclature gives pride of place to the nation’s gallantry awardees, battle heroes and distinguished military leaders

title: Expanded GHMC likely to share town planning revenue with HMDA
content: A proposal, reportedly approved by the State government, seeks to retain HMDA as the sanctioning authority for structures with more than 10 floors in the entire expanded area of GHMC

title: Koil Alwar Tirumanjanam performed at Srinivasa Mangapuram
content: The purificatory ritual precedes the annual nine-day Brahmotsavams at the TTD’s Sri Kalyana Venkateswara Swamy temple commencing February 8

title: CM set to open BioAsia on Feb. 17; Telangana Rising Vision to be showcased
content: Union Ministers, global pharma leaders scheduled to participate in the 2-day life sciences and health-tech forum

title: A.P. High Court adjourns Ambati Rambabu’s lunch motion petition to February 11
content: It prays for quashing the cases registered against him for allegedly making abusive comments on the Chief Minister

title: Guidelines issued for Circular Economy and Waste Recycling Policy
content: They seek to frame actionable procedures, standards and templates for all the stakeholders to tackle critical environmental challenges arising in the industrial waste landscape

title: PM ‘hiding behind’ Speaker; claims of threat an ‘absolute lie,’ says Congress
content: Party’s reaction comes after Speaker says he asked the PM not to come to the House following information that some Congress MPs could carry out an ‘unexpected act’ near his seat

title: Central Kerala LDF rally led by Jose K. Mani to begin on Friday
content: Organisers say the rally aims at showcasing the development initiatives and social welfare programmes initiated by LDF government

title: Devotee-couple bring oxygen cylinder for darshan at Mayakka Devi Temple in Chinchali
content: It has been proven many a time that devotion can make people indulge in acts that look difficult and defy logic

title: TDB aims to tackle pollution in Pampa ahead of next Sabarimala pilgrimage season
content: Campaign will be rolled out in April in all south Indian States using press meets, social media, newspaper and TV, and FM radio to crack down on the practice of pilgrims discarding clothes in the river. Three truckloads of abandoned clothes were removed in the final round of cleaning after the season this  year

title: Road Safety Cadet programme to foster safe road culture among students
content: State-level inauguration of programme will be held at Mavelikkara this month, say Minister for General Education and Transport

title: 48,000 trees mapped as Mysuru rolls out city-wide tree audit
content: Of the 65 wards under the Mysuru City Corporation, surveys are currently underway in 37 wards, with more than 48,000 trees already documented

title: SFI demands government takeover of Mohan Babu University in A.P.
content: A roundtable seeks withdrawal of alleged false cases filed against student leaders and refund of ₹26.17 crore to students as recommended by the APSCHE

title: Trump sails into a Columbus controversy
